name: Name
noThreadsYetDesc: Start a new conversation to see your thread history here.
deleteAllThreadsConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all threads? This action cannot be undone.
enterNameForProvider: Enter a name for your provider
providerAlreadyExists: Provider with name "{{name}}" already exists. Please choose a different name.
noResultsFoundDesc: We couldn't find any chats matching your search. Try a different keyword.

addModel.title: Add Model
addModel.description: Add a new model to the provider

editModel.title: Edit Model: {{modelId}}
editModel.description: Configure model capabilities by toggling the options below.

outOfContextError.title: Out of context error
outOfContextError.description: This chat is reaching the AI's memory limit, like a whiteboard filling up. We can expand the memory window (called context size) so it remembers more, but it may use more of your computer's memory. We can also truncate the input, which means it will forget some of the chat history to make room for new messages.
outOfContextError.increaseContextSizeDescription: Do you want to increase the context size?

toolApproval.title: Tool Permission Request
toolApproval.securityNotice: Only allow tools you trust. Tools can access your system and data.

deleteModel.title: Delete Model: {{modelId}}
deleteModel.description: Are you sure you want to delete this model? This action cannot be undone.

deleteProvider.title: Delete Provider
deleteProvider.description: Delete this provider and all its models. This action cannot be undone.
deleteProvider.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this provider? This action cannot be undone.

modelSettings.title: Model Settings - {{modelId}}
modelSettings.description: Configure model settings to optimize performance and behavior.

changeDataFolder.title: Change Data Folder Location
changeDataFolder.description: Are you sure you want to change the data folder location? This will move all your data to the new location and restart the application.

deleteAllThreads.title: Delete All Threads
deleteAllThreads.description: All threads will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

deleteThread.description: Are you sure you want to delete this thread? This action cannot be undone.

allThreadsUnfavorited.title: All Threads Unfavorited
allThreadsUnfavorited.description: All threads have been removed from your favorites.

deleteAllThreads.title: Delete All Threads
deleteAllThreads.description: All threads have been permanently deleted.

renameThread.title: Rename Thread
renameThread.description: Thread title has been renamed to '{{title}}'

deleteThread.title: Delete Thread
deleteThread.description: This thread has been permanently deleted.

editMessage.title: Edit Message
editMessage.description: Message edited successfully. Please wait for the model to respond.

appUpdateDownloaded.title: App Update Downloaded
appUpdateDownloaded.description: The app update has been downloaded successfully.

appUpdateDownloadFailed.title: App Update Download Failed
appUpdateDownloadFailed.description: Failed to download the app update. Please try again.
